body:
```
icebin: Added new package
```
- icebin = Regridding and coupling library for dynamic ice sheets and GCMs with elevation classes.
- glint2 = Old version of icebin
- ibmisc = Utility library used by icebin
- pism = Dynamic ice mode that icebin currently works with.

This PR continues #1545 ; see there for code review.
title: icebin: Added New Package
